channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Martínez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: President Trump expected to address affordability at Pennsylvania rally
item.description: President Trump will hold a rally in Pennsylvania Tuesday, where he's expected to talk about his administration's efforts to address two major concerns for voters: the economy and affordability.
item.content:encoded: President Trump will hold a rally in Pennsylvania Tuesday, where he's expected to talk about his administration's efforts to address two major concerns for voters: the economy and affordability.
item.dc:creator: Tamara Keith

item.title: Republican strategist unpacks Trump administration's stance on affordability
item.description: Americans are concerned about high costs, but President Trump recently called affordability "a Democrat hoax." NPR unpacks the administration's messaging with GOP strategist Brendan Buck.
item.content:encoded: Americans are concerned about high costs, but President Trump recently called affordability "a Democrat hoax." NPR unpacks the administration's messaging with GOP strategist Brendan Buck.
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: Democratic Rep. Jasmine Crockett launches bid for U.S. Senate in Texas
item.description: Democratic Rep. Jasmine Crockett launched her campaign Monday for the U.S. Senate in Texas, a critical race for Democrats hoping to reclaim the Senate majority in the 2026 midterm elections.
item.content:encoded: Democratic Rep. Jasmine Crockett launched her campaign Monday for the U.S. Senate in Texas, a critical race for Democrats hoping to reclaim the Senate majority in the 2026 midterm elections.
item.dc:creator: Bekah Morr

item.title: Black bear populations are bouncing back. Here's how these Texas towns are coping
item.description: Historically, Black bears were the biggest predator to travel the Big Bend area of Texas. But overhunting and habitat loss led to their decline.
item.content:encoded:
Historically, Black bears were the biggest predator to travel the Big Bend area of Texas. But overhunting and habitat loss led to their decline.

(Image credit: Carlos Morales)
item.dc:creator: Carlos Morales

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: President Trump expected to address affordability at Pennsylvania rally, SCOTUS seems poised to side with Trump in FTC firing, Indiana lawmakers expected to vote on controversial redistricting plan.
item.content:encoded: President Trump expected to address affordability at Pennsylvania rally, SCOTUS seems poised to side with Trump in FTC firing, Indiana lawmakers expected to vote on controversial redistricting plan.
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: Machado to accept Nobel as fight against Venezuelan regime intensifies
item.description: As María Corina Machado is set to receive the Nobel Peace Prize, the Venezuelan opposition leader is betting everything on her prediction of an imminent political transition.
item.content:encoded:
As María Corina Machado is set to receive the Nobel Peace Prize, the Venezuelan opposition leader is betting everything on her prediction of an imminent political transition.

(Image credit: Odd Andersen)
item.dc:creator: John Otis

item.title: Fighting between Thailand and Cambodia threatens Trump-brokered ceasefire
item.description: The fighting between Thailand and Cambodia could deal a serious blow to a ceasefire agreement brokered by President Donald Trump with help from Malaysia's Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim.
item.content:encoded: The fighting between Thailand and Cambodia could deal a serious blow to a ceasefire agreement brokered by President Donald Trump with help from Malaysia's Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim.
item.dc:creator: Michael Sullivan

item.title: Indiana lawmakers to vote on Trump-backed plan to redraw maps in favor of GOP
item.description: Indiana Republicans are weighing a plan backed by President Trump to redraw its congressional map to add more GOP seats ahead of next year's midterm election.
item.content:encoded: Indiana Republicans are weighing a plan backed by President Trump to redraw its congressional map to add more GOP seats ahead of next year's midterm election.
item.dc:creator: Sam Gringlas

item.title: HIPAA protects patient privacy, but some say it shuts out caregivers
item.description: The federal HIPAA law protects patient privacy, but some say it can shut out family members trying to help relatives who are experiencing mental health crises.
item.content:encoded: The federal HIPAA law protects patient privacy, but some say it can shut out family members trying to help relatives who are experiencing mental health crises.
item.dc:creator: Maxwell David Howard

item.title: Environmental groups call for a moratorium on data center construction
item.description: An environmental group is leading a call for Congress to place a moratorium on the construction of new data centers used to power artificial intelligence.
item.content:encoded: An environmental group is leading a call for Congress to place a moratorium on the construction of new data centers used to power artificial intelligence.
item.dc:creator: Jeff Brady
